About Jacques

A Caribbean native with deep Haitian roots, bringing a multicultural perspective to leadership and organizational development

10+Years Exp.

Background & Nationality

A Caribbean native with deep Haitian roots, I bring a rich, multicultural perspective to my work. I currently reside in Kigali, Rwanda, where my diverse experience across Africa and the Caribbean informs my global outlook on leadership and organizational development.

Professional Identity

As an Executive Leadership Coach, Business Consultant, and Organizational Development Expert, I focus on transforming leaders and organizations through tailored coaching and strategic interventions. I currently serve as an Executive Leadership Coach & Organizational Development Consultant with Leadership Management International (LMI) East Africa.

Education

  • MBA in Project Management from Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia (UCAM)
  • Master of Social Work in International Cooperation and Humanitarian Aid from KALU Institute
  • Studies in Administration and Management from Institut National d'Administration, de Gestion et des Hautes Études Internationales (INAGHEI)

Languages

Services

Tailored solutions to empower leaders and transform organizations for optimal performance

Executive Leadership Coaching

Personalized coaching for senior leaders to enhance their capabilities and effectiveness.

Organizational Development

Transforming organizational structures, processes, and culture for improved performance.

Strategic Planning

Developing and implementing effective strategic plans aligned with vision and goals.

Team Development

Enhancing team cohesion, communication, and performance through tailored interventions.

Project Management

Expert planning, execution, and evaluation of projects across multiple sectors.

Capacity Building

Comprehensive training programs to empower individuals and teams with needed skills.

Professional Journey

Explore my path through leadership development, education, and organizational transformation

Present

Executive Leadership Coach & Organizational Development Consultant

Leadership Management International (LMI) East Africa

Providing tailored executive coaching and capacity-building support to senior leaders across public and private sectors in Rwanda and East Africa.

2022-2023

Master of Business Administration (MBA), Project Management

Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia (UCAM)

Focused on Strategic Management and Leadership, Strategic Project Management, and Change Management.

2018-2021

Master of Social Work (MSW), International Cooperation and Humanitarian Aid

KALU Institute

Studied International Cooperation, Humanitarian Aid, and Logical Framework Analysis.

2014-2016

Head of Training for SMEs and External Services

Entrepreneurs du Monde – Haiti

Designed, coordinated, and evaluated training programs aimed at empowering entrepreneurs and small to medium-sized enterprises.

Prior

Educational Director and Full-Time Instructor

ETRE Ayisyen Institut Entrepreneurial – Haiti

Oversaw pedagogical coordination of school programs designed to foster youth entrepreneurship.
